title: Looking for team members.
body:
Hey everyone!

My friends and I have been really bored recently and decided to set up a ranked team for the lulz.
Please note this is nothing serious, but we would appreciate if you tried to play your best and preferably not feed (no pressure though).
We're all real life friends from Sydney, Australia (so you have a clue about time zones).

Most of us have been playing casually on and off since season 1/2 but we're currently 'unranked', although some of us have had other accounts in the past and were around the plat/gold level.

Top: Open, we have someone, but they're rarely online.
Jungle: Open
Mid: Taken
ADC: Taken, looking for sub.
Support: Taken (myself)

I can go anywhere, but if our current ADC plays, i'll support them as i know their play style well.
(Note: This will NOT be daily/consistent. We're all aged 20+ University students/Full time workers.)

If you're interested, add either Fuh or Ngau in-game and remind us who you are and what role you'd like.

replies.body: Jg Main if you need I will add one of you 2 now
hello, i'll be happy to join, looking for some new friends to play with
I can sub for the adc if needed :) i can top lane as well add me if need ( Posso The Pimp)
i can top or jungle, gold 4 last season.. add me in game if interested "draeneroth"
